lead_paragraph: Legislation that would have accelerated the process in a way that critics said threatened to erode patient safety was formally released, in a scaled-back version with many of the most controversial provisions left out.

headline.print_headline: Bill to Speed Approvals for Drugs Is Cut Back
headline.main: Bill to Speed Approvals for Drugs Is Cut Back

snippet: Legislation that would have accelerated the process in a way that critics said threatened to erode patient safety was formally released, in a scaled-back version with many of the most controversial provisions left out.
abstract: House releases scaled-back draft of bill intended to speed up pace at which Food and Drug Administration approves drugs; critics had charged that changes would impact public safety.
